Title: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for toilet paper and toilet tissue sold for household use, and incontinence products
Summary: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for toilet paper and toilet tissue sold for household use, and incontinence products.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting a sales and compensating use tax exemption for certain taxpayers for toilet paper and toilet tissue sold for household use, and incontinence products
